courses.learningObjectives:
This course covers the fundamentals of web development,
including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
It also introduces students to responsive design principles.
Students will work on a real world project.

instructor.name: John Smith
instructor.background:
A committed undergraduate maths student who is persistent and eager to teach and inspire others.I have always liked settings goals and allocating all of my focus on meeting them. With students, I can adapt depending on how they prefer to be taught so that they learn in the most effective way. 

As someone who has been studying maths consistently throughout my student life, I take enjoyment in helping others out with problems relating to the subject and imparting knowledge and skills to future mathematicians.
